nodes.id: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会办公室
国务院行政审批制度改革工作领导小组办公室
en: Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission

location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区东四南大街85号

description.zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会的办事机构，是正部级中共中央办事机构。负责全国行政管理体制和机构改革以及机构编制的日常管理工作。既是中共中央的机构，又是国务院的机构。
description.en: The working body of the Central Institutional Organization Commission, it is a ministerial-level working body of the CPC Central Committee. It is responsible for the daily management of the national administrative system and institutional reform, as well as institutional organization. It is an institution of both the CPC Central Committee and the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任，兼任中共中央组织部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission, and concurrently as a Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的职能部门之一，负责党组织建设、干部队伍建设和人才工作。自2018年起，统一管理中央机构编制委员会办公室。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the CPC Central Committee, responsible for party organization construction, cadre team construction, and talent work. Since 2018, it has centrally managed the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央议事协调机构，负责党和国家机构编制工作。
description.en: A deliberation and coordination body of the CPC Central Committee, responsible for the institutional organization work of the Party and the state.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革
en: Deepening Reform of Party and State Institutions

description.zh-cn: 2018年由中共中央推动的对党和国家机构进行的系统性、整体性、重构性改革。该方案决定将中央机构编制委员会办公室的日常管理归于中共中央组织部。
description.en: A systematic, holistic, and reconstructive reform of party and state institutions promoted by the CPC Central Committee in 2018. This plan placed the daily management of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission under the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 国家机构编制委员会办公室

zh-cn: 国家机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会办公室的前身机构之一，1988年组建，与国务院机构改革办公室一个机构两块牌子。
description.en: One of the predecessor organizations of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission, established in 1988 under the arrangement of 'one institution, two names' with the State Council Office for Institutional Reform.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人事部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人事部
en: Ministry of Personnel of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门，负责国家人事行政管理工作。1988年版的人事部承担了国家机构编制委员会办公室的工作。
description.en: Formerly a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national personnel administration. The 1988 version of the Ministry of Personnel undertook the work of the Office of the National Commission for Institutional Organization.

description.zh-cn: 曾为国务院组成部门，后被撤销。1978年重新组建，1982年其职责并入新组建的劳动人事部。
description.en: Formerly a constituent department of the State Council, later abolished. It was re-established in 1978, and its responsibilities were merged into the newly formed Ministry of Labour and Personnel in 1982.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国劳动人事部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国劳动人事部
en: Ministry of Labour and Personnel of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1982年由国家劳动总局、国家人事局、国务院科技干部局、国家编制委员会合并组建，负责管理全国机构编制工作。
description.en: Formed in 1982 by the merger of the State Bureau of Labour, the State Bureau of Personnel, the State Council Bureau of Scientific and Technological Cadres, and the State Commission for Institutional Organization, it was responsible for managing national institutional organization work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

nodes.id: 中国机构编制管理研究会

zh-cn: 中国机构编制管理研究会

description.zh-cn: 由中央机构编制委员会办公室主管的社会团体。
description.en: A social organization supervised by the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

relationships.target: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 李小新自2022年4月起担任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Li Xiaoxin has been serving as the Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission since April 2022.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 李小新兼任中国共产党中央委员会组织部副部长。
description.en: Li Xiaoxin concurrently serves as a Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 郭沛自2021年2月起担任中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Guo Pei has been serving as a Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission since February 2021.

relationships.target: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 张雅林自2022年4月起担任中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Zhang Yalin has been serving as a Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission since April 2022.

relationships.target: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 黄路自2024年11月起担任中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Huang Lu has been serving as a Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission since November 2024.

relationships.target: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 王伟峰自2025年6月起担任中央机构编制委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Wang Weifeng has been serving as a Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission since June 2025.

relationships.source: 中央机构编制委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中央机构编制委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会办公室是中央机构编制委员会的常设办事机构。
description.en: The Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission is the permanent working body of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

relationships.source: 中央机构编制委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会办公室列入中共中央直属机构序列，是中共中央办事机构。
description.en: The Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission is listed in the sequence of institutions directly under the CPC Central Committee and is a working body of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中央机构编制委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会办公室同时也是国务院的机构，是国务院机构编制管理机关。
description.en: The Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission is also an institution of the State Council, serving as its institutional organization management organ.

relationships.source: 中央机构编制委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 根据2018年《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，中共中央组织部统一管理中央机构编制委员会办公室。
description.en: According to the 2018 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee centrally manages the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革
relationships.target: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 2018年的《深化党和国家机构改革方案》决定将中央机构编制委员会办公室归口中共中央组织部管理。
description.en: The 2018 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions' stipulated that the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission would be managed by the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 国家机构编制委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 国家机构编制委员会办公室是中央机构编制委员会办公室的前身。
description.en: The Office of the National Commission for Institutional Organization was the predecessor of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国人事部
relationships.target: 国家机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 1988年组建国家机构编制委员会办公室，由人事部下属的中央机构编制司、地方机构编制司承担其工作。
description.en: In 1988, the Office of the National Commission for Institutional Organization was established, with its work undertaken by the Central Institutional Organization Department and the Local Institutional Organization Department of the Ministry of Personnel.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国劳动人事部

description.zh-cn: 1982年，国家编制委员会的职责被整合进新组建的中华人民共和国劳动人事部。
description.en: In 1982, the responsibilities of the State Commission for Institutional Organization were integrated into the newly established Ministry of Labour and Personnel of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中央机构编制委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中国机构编制管理研究会

description.zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会办公室主管社会团体中国机构编制管理研究会。
description.en: The Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission supervises the social organization China Society of Administrative Management.
